text: "About Damn Time" is a song recorded by American singer-songwriter Lizzo. It was released April 12, 2022, through Nice Life and Atlantic Records. It is the lead single from her second studio album, Special (2022). The song has so far peaked at number two on the US Billboard Hot 100, becoming her second-highest peak in the US, after "Truth Hurts" was at the top of the Hot 100 in 2019. == References == Category:2022 songs Category:Lizzo songs
title: About Damn Time
